metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27418 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A Use After Free vulnerability in Fedora Linux kernel 5.9.0-rc9 allows attackers to obatin sensitive information via vgacon_invert_region() function.

criterions.comment: linux package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-hwe package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gke: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
